src:
Sebut Barcelona Sulit Juara Liga Champions, Gerard Pique Justru Bicara Treble
06 Nov 2019, 05:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona hanya mampu bermain imbang 0-0 dengan Slavia Praha, matchday 4 Liga Champions 2019/20, Rabu (6/11/2019). Tim asuhan Ernesto Valverde ini sekali lagi memberikan performa di bawah level yang seharusnya, sebagaimana dijelaskan oleh Gerard Pique.
Bek senior Barca ini mengakui bahwa mereka belum bisa memenuhi ekspektasi musim ini. Permainan Barca belum benar-benar meyakinkan sejak awal dan masih sama sampai sekarang.
Barca memasuki laga ini setelah kekalahan 1-3 dari Levante di La Liga akhir pekan lalu. Tentu publik Camp Nou mengharapkan perkembangan.
Sayangnya, fans setia Blaugrana itu justru melihat permainan yang sama buruknya. Pique bahkan sampai mengakui Barca tidak akan bisa juara Liga Champions jika bermain di level itu.

Mengapa? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Call Barcelona Difficult to Champions League, Gerard Pique Treble Talk Instead
Nov 6 2019, 05:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona can only draw 0-0 with Slavia Prague, matchday 4 Champions League 2019/20, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Ernesto Valverde's team once again gave a performance below the level they should have, as explained by Gerard Pique.
The Barca senior defender admitted that they have not been able to meet the expectations of this season. Barca's game hasn't been really convincing from the start and it's still the same today.
Barca enter this match after the 1-3 defeat of Levante in La Liga last weekend. Of course the Camp Nou public expects development.
Unfortunately, loyal Blaugrana fans actually see the same bad game. Pique even admitted that Barca could not win the Champions League if he played at that level.

Why? Read below, Bolaneters!
